verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1352><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> inexcusable <S%G379><s%>, O <S%G5599><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, whoever you are <S%G3956><s%> that judges <S%G2919><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> where <S%G1722><s%> <S%G99999><s%> you judge <S%G2919><s%> another <S%G2087><s%>, you condemn <S%G2632><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> you <S%G846><s%> that judge <S%G2919><s%> do the same things <S%G4238><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> we are sure <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> them which commit <S%G4238><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> do you <S%G3049><s%> think this <S%G5124><s%>, O <S%G5599><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, that judge <S%G2919><s%> them which do <S%G4238><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the same <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> shall escape <S%G1628><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?

Or <S%G2228><s%> do you <S%G2706><s%> despise the riches <S%G4149><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> goodness <S%G5544><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> forbearance <S%G463><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> longsuffering <S%G3115><s%>; not knowing <S%G50><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the goodness <S%G5543><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> leads <S%G71><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> hardness <S%G4643><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> impenitent <S%G279><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> treasures up <S%G2343><s%> to yourself <S%G4572><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> against <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of wrath <S%G3709><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> revelation <S%G602><s%> of the righteous judgment <S%G1341><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>;
Who <S%G3739><s%> will render <S%G591><s%> to every man <S%G1538><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%>:

To them <S%G3588><s%> who by <S%G2596><s%> patience continue <S%G5281><s%> in well <S%G18><s%> doing <S%G2041><s%> seek for <S%G2212><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immortality <S%G861><s%>, eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> to them <S%G3588><s%> that are contentious <S%G2052><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> do not obey <S%G544><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> obey <S%G3982><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%>, indignation <S%G2372><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%>,

Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> anguish <S%G4730><s%>, upon <S%G1909><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> that does <S%G2716><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>, to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first <S%G4412><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to the Gentile <S%G1672><s%>;

But <S%G1161><s%> glory <S%G2532><s%>, honor <S%G5092><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, to every man <S%G3956><s%> that works <S%G2038><s%> good <S%G18><s%>, to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first <S%G4412><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to the Gentile <S%G1672><s%>:
For <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> respect of persons <S%G4382><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> have sinned <S%G264><s%> without law <S%G460><s%> shall <S%G622><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> without law <S%G460><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> have sinned <S%G264><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> shall be judged <S%G2919><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>;

(For <S%G1063><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the hearers <S%G202><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> are just <S%G1342><s%> before <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the doers <S%G4163><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> shall be justified <S%G1344><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, which have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, do <S%G4160><s%> by nature <S%G5449><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> contained in the law <S%G3551><s%>, these <S%G3778><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, are <S%G1526><s%> a law <S%G3551><s%> unto themselves <S%G1438><s%>:

Which <S%G3748><s%> show <S%G1731><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> written <S%G1123><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>, their <S%G846><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> also bearing witness <S%G4828><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> their thoughts <S%G3053><s%> meanwhile <S%G3342><s%> accusing <S%G2723><s%> or else <S%G2228><s%> <S%G99999><s%> excusing <S%G626><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>;)

In <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall judge <S%G2919><s%> the secrets <S%G2927><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%>.

Behold <S%G1492><s%>, you <S%G4771><s%> are called <S%G2028><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> rest <S%G1879><s%> in the law <S%G3551><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> make your boast <S%G2744><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> his will <S%G2307><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> approve <S%G1381><s%> the things that are more excellent <S%G1308><s%>, being instructed <S%G2727><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>;

And <S%G5037><s%> are confident that <S%G3982><s%> you yourself <S%G4572><s%> are <S%G1511><s%> a guide <S%G3595><s%> of the blind <S%G5185><s%>, a light <S%G5457><s%> of them <S%G3588><s%> which are in <S%G1722><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%>,

A instructor <S%G3810><s%> of the foolish <S%G878><s%>, a teacher <S%G1320><s%> of babes <S%G3516><s%>, which have <S%G2192><s%> the form <S%G3446><s%> of knowledge <S%G1108><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>.

You <S%G3588><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> which teach <S%G1321><s%> another <S%G2087><s%>, teach you <S%G1321><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%>? you that preach <S%G2784><s%> a man should not <S%G3361><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%>, do you steal <S%G2813><s%>?

You that say <S%G3004><s%> a man should not <S%G3361><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%>, do you commit adultery <S%G3431><s%>? you that abhor <S%G948><s%> idols <S%G1497><s%>, do you commit sacrilege <S%G2416><s%>?

You that <S%G3739><s%> make your boast <S%G2744><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> breaking <S%G3847><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> dishonor <S%G818><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is blasphemed <S%G987><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Nations <S%G1484><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> profits <S%G5623><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> you keep <S%G4238><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you be <S%G1510><s%> a breaker <S%G3848><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>, your <S%G4675><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> the righteousness <S%G1345><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>, shall not <S%G3780><s%> his <S%G846><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> be counted <S%G3049><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> shall not <S%G2919><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> which is by <S%G1537><s%> nature <S%G5449><s%>, if it fulfill <S%G5055><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, judge <S%G2919><s%> you <S%G4571><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the letter <S%G1121><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> do transgress <S%G3848><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%>, which is one <S%G3588><s%> <S%G99999><s%> outwardly <S%G5318><s%>; neither <S%G3761><s%> is that circumcision <S%G1722><s%>, which is outward <S%G5318><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> is a Jew <S%G2453><s%>, which is one <S%G3588><s%> <S%G99999><s%> inwardly <S%G2927><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> is that of the heart <S%G2588><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, and not <S%G3756><s%> in the letter <S%G1121><s%>; whose <S%G3739><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.
